Articles.Content: Hi all obligatory first post hello here! Found KSP two days ago after being referred by a friend, and loving it! Here\'s to many successful orbits, and many more launch attempts

Hello and welcome to the forums!

Happy launching!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Hopefully happy landings too ha ha! Thanks for the welcome guys from what I\'ve seen so far the forum is as awesome as the game itself!
Always room for more kiwis! *successful landings are not included in the game guarantee!
